September W 1961
Mr. Frank Schooley
Director of University Broadcasting
228 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
What you propose in your letter of September 26th is per¬
fectly all right with me.
Is the meeting of the Publications Committee still scheduled
as a breakfast event for Monday morning? I will do my
darnedest to get there before you adjourn, but my success in
doing so will depend upon the joint cooperation of the B&O
Railroad and the Washington taxi drivers.
Radio and Television Communications
EGS:vz
